Uses of Package
Controller

Packages that use Controller
Package
Description
Controller
Communicates between model and views
Controller.Phases
Main Game Phases
Controller.Phases.SubPhases
Phases in the main game loop
Models
Contains basic building classes
Models.Orders
Contains Model of all Orders
Models.Strategy
Contains Model strategy
StartupPhase
Contains test regarding StartUpPhase
Utils
Contains method called by multiple classes
Views
Contains output to be presented
  • Classes in Controller used by Controller
    Class
    Description
    GameEngine
    Represents the game engine core for the strategy game.
    LogEntryBuffer
    obtain outputs after executing commands
    LogWriter
    write the output to log file
    Observable
    Observable class
    Observer
    Interface class for the Observer
    OrderWriter
    write the output to order buffer file
    Tournament
    The Tournament class represents a series of games played using a GameEngine.
